Thanks, Marji. I know.

The waiting is the hardest part---so far.

~Kelly

Kelly, I'm most sorry that I didn't read Sandra's email before I
posted. I've got you and Brenda and Leslie in my thoughts and your
families in my thoughts.

Love,
Marji

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Fw:  Dearest President
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/16/2003 2:24:29 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Thank you. I know of just the three of us, Brenda, Leslie, and me, who are quite
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/16/2003 2:24:29 PM Eastern Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:
> I'd rather not. Not because it's not important, and not because it's off
> topic, but because it's stress-producing.

Thank you. I know of just the three of us, Brenda, Leslie, and me, who are
quite uncomfortable with the situation--because it's a family issue that hits
VERY close to home. I can assure you that Brenda, Leslie, and I would be the
three MOST opposed to war, but because our situations (husbands in the
military), the subject is difficult to discuss.

Thanks to everyone for avoiding the topic (we get enough of it at home!).

~Kelly
